QuestData.Title: If These Stones Could Speak
QuestData.Description: This is a very ancient place, traveler.$b$bOnly recently have I pieced together a method of translating the forgotten language carved into these stones.$b$bOh, the thrill of discovery! This never gets old, I assure you.$b$bHere, you are the guest. You do the honors. I insist.$b$bUse this key to unlock the secrets the stones contain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Stone Monoliths at the Circle of Bone.
